creator: Playgendary Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Kick the Buddy Remastered!
The game that helps you deal with the anger that you accumulate throughout the day.
It’s a new way to use mobile gaming for the good!
As a player, choose from a wide variety of weaponry to have some stress relief action!
Get AK-47, Grenades, Swords or even Godly powers and unleash them on the dummy in a gaming form!
Does it call you a loser? Take the Rocket, and make it the Rocket Buddy!
Frustrated enough to beat the boss? Better use the good old buddy punch!
Don’t have any stress? Straightforward gameplay and Buddy’s humor will surely put a grim on your face!
Funny games are great, but will they help you to chill during the day-to-day struggle?
Kick the Buddy Remastered sure will! It is the best dummy game for a reason!
Millions of players from all over the world are already playing. Will you be the next?
descriptionShort: Kick it, slice it, drop a nuke on it! Find out the best way to get rid of anger!

title: Kick The Buddy Remastered

creator: Playgendary Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Kick the Buddy Remastered!
The game that helps you deal with the anger that you accumulate throughout the day.
It’s a new way to use mobile gaming for the good!
As a player, choose from a wide variety of weaponry to have some stress relief action!
Get AK-47, Grenades, Swords or even Godly powers and unleash them on the dummy in a gaming form!
Does it call you a loser? Take the Rocket, and make it the Rocket Buddy!
Frustrated enough to beat the boss? Better use the good old buddy punch!
Don’t have any stress? Straightforward gameplay and Buddy’s humor will surely put a grin on your face!
Funny games are great, but will they help you to chill during the day-to-day struggle?
Kick the Buddy Remastered sure will! It is an awesome dummy game for a reason!
Millions of players from all over the world are already playing. Will you be the next?

creator: Playgendary Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Kick the Buddy Remastered!
The game that helps you deal with the anger that you accumulate throughout the day.
It’s a new way to use mobile gaming for the good!
As a player, choose from a wide variety of weaponry to have some stress relief action!
Get AK-47, Grenades, Swords or even Godly powers and unleash them on the dummy in a gaming form!
Does it call you a loser? Take the Rocket, and make it the Rocket Buddy!
Frustrated enough to beat the boss? Better use the good old buddy punch!
Don’t have any stress? Straightforward gameplay and Buddy’s humor will surely put a grin on your face!
Funny games are great, but will they help you to chill during the day-to-day struggle?
Kick the Buddy Remastered sure will! It is an awesome dummy game for a reason!
Millions of players from all over the world are already playing. Will you be the next?

descriptionHtml:
Hit, cut, blow up, burn and play the mini-games. You now have a virtually limitless arsenal: rockets, grenades, automatic rifles, torture instruments… and even a nuclear bomb. We present to you Kick the Buddy: Second Kick – it’s more than just a game! Want more kicks?

Even if you're a relatively stress-free person you need to blow off steam at some point or another!

Kick the Buddy is a PERFECT METHOD OF STRESS RELIEF!

Key Features:
- Colorful graphics
- Physics model
- Super cool elements and categories
- Wardrobe with fashionable clothes for Buddyman
- Sound effects. Now Buddyman has his own voice
- Decorations
- Bank with buddyman money
- Interesting achievements

Grab this game to ensure you're never without a way to lower your blood pressure or a perfect tool to kill a few spare minutes!

Have any suggestions regarding the new items or ideas for Buddy comments? Include your suggestion in the feedback!

creator: Playgendary Limited
descriptionHtml:
Buddy is back to help you unwind and bring some lighthearted fun to your day! Enjoy the remastered classic with Buddy, everyone’s favorite stress-relief doll, designed to help you let off some steam. Customize, interact, and get creative with Buddy in a playful experience that’s packed with surprises.

Simply tap, drag, and throw Buddy around the screen in an intuitive gameplay experience. You can start by stretching Buddy’s limbs, tossing him against walls, or testing his endurance in new and entertaining ways. As you continue to interact with Buddy, you’ll earn coins to unlock an incredible variety of tools, effects, and items that offer endless ways to play. Each interaction brings you closer to unlocking more dynamic experiences as Buddy brings his unique personality to life with funny reactions and sound effects.

Collect coins to unlock over fifty different items! From classic tools to creative gadgets, each item adds a new level of fun. Every interaction with Buddy is a chance to relax, be entertained, and enjoy some stress-free moments, whether you’re unlocking new costumes, testing out a range of props, or exploring the new achievements.

Key Features:

– Remastered Visuals: Enjoy updated colorful graphics that bring Buddy to life like never before.
– Enhanced Physics: Buddy’s reactions are more realistic, making interactions fun and satisfying.
– Interactive Props: Unlock and experiment with a wide variety of items that create unique reactions every time.
– Wardrobe Updates: Customize Buddy with a brand-new selection of fashionable outfits.
– New Sound Effects & Voice: Buddy’s reactions now include hilarious sound effects and voice lines for added fun.
– Achievements & Rewards: Collect achievements as you explore all the playful ways to interact with Buddy.

Whether you’re looking to unwind after a busy day or just want some light-hearted entertainment, Kick the Buddy: Second Kick is the perfect way to play. Start your journey with Buddy and see where the fun takes you! Download now and enjoy Buddy’s delightful company anytime, anywhere.
